Package it.polimi.ingsw.resources

Class ChoiceResource

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.resources.ChoiceResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
Resource
public class ChoiceResource
extends java.lang.Object
implements Resource
ChoiceResource represents a resource that can be spent or obtained, but the player has the choice to select such resource

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ChoiceResource​(ChoiceSet choices)
    The constructor creates an instance of a ChoiceResource given a ChoiceSet Note that if the ChoiceSet has size 1 (only one choice is allowed), than finalChoice is initialized to that choice

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean canChoose​(ConcreteResource resource)
    canChoose returns whether a given resource can be chosen
    ConcreteResource getResource()
    getResource returns the chosen resource Note that this can be null if no choice has been made yet
    boolean isConcrete()
    isConcrete returns true when a choice has been made
    void makeChoice​(ConcreteResource resource)
    makeChoice is the method that allows to select a (valid) resource

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ChoiceResource

      public ChoiceResource​(ChoiceSet choices) throws InvalidChoiceSetException
      The constructor creates an instance of a ChoiceResource given a ChoiceSet Note that if the ChoiceSet has size 1 (only one choice is allowed), than finalChoice is initialized to that choice
      Parameters:
      choices - The ChoiceSet of valid ConcreteResources
      Throws:
      InvalidChoiceSetException - choices is null or an empty set

  • Method Details

    • canChoose

      public boolean canChoose​(ConcreteResource resource) throws InvalidResourceException
      canChoose returns whether a given resource can be chosen
      Parameters:
      resource - The resource to check
      Returns:
      True iff resource is contained in choices
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceException - resource is null

    • makeChoice

      public void makeChoice​(ConcreteResource resource) throws InvalidResourceException
      makeChoice is the method that allows to select a (valid) resource
      Parameters:
      resource - The resource to choose
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceException - resource is null or is not a valid choice

    • getResource

      public ConcreteResource getResource()
      getResource returns the chosen resource Note that this can be null if no choice has been made yet
      Specified by:
      getResource in interface Resource
      Returns:
      The chosen resource for this object

    • isConcrete

      public boolean isConcrete()
      isConcrete returns true when a choice has been made
      Specified by:
      isConcrete in interface Resource
      Returns:
      True iff a valid resource has been selected
